channel.title: Npc
channel.description: I need my train arena to be nowild...only my ::wild1 ::wild2 and ::wild3 as pking zone :eek: Can you either help me get a npc to spawn saying "don't pk here or ban". [b]Or Make It Non Wild.[/b]

item.title: Npc
item.dc:creator: @2xbladex2 2xbladex2
item.description:
@2xbladex2 wrote:

skate i tried that…it compiled perfectly…but when i ran server said all this shit…and server would you say you were logged…in and its confusing when you said add after last “}” i didnt get that part.

Read full topic

item.title: Npc
item.dc:creator: @i_am_an_elf i am an elf
item.description:
@i_am_an_elf wrote:

blade making it non wild depends on the area tell me the coords of your training area and what you want to be non wild. ill hook u up when i get the chance

Read full topic

item.title: Npc
item.dc:creator: @skatelifemanager skatelifemanager
item.description:
@skatelifemanager wrote:

ok.
open up autospawn.cfg and add this

spawn = NPCID	XCORD	YCORD	0	0	0	0	0	0	NPCNAME

then open up npchander.java
and search for “moo”

below the last

}

add this

} if (npcs[i].npcType == NPCID) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 3) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Don't Pk here or ban!"; }

Read full topic
